name: Emotional Intelligence (EQ)
description: Master the ability to understand and manage your own emotions, and those of the people around you.

levels.title: Self-Awareness
levels.objective: Recognize and understand your own moods and emotions.
levels.description: Develop the habit of monitoring your emotional state and identifying triggers.
practices: Pause for 5 seconds before reacting to stress

levels.title: Self-Regulation
levels.description: Learn techniques for managing stress, staying calm under pressure, and adapting to change.
practices: Practice deep breathing exercises during stress
Reframe negative thoughts into constructive ones
Wait 24 hours before sending an angry email

levels.title: Empathy & Social Skill
levels.objective: Understand the emotional makeup of other people.
levels.description: Focus on reading social cues, listening with empathy, and building rapport.
practices: Ask 'How are you feeling about this?' and really listen
